charges.description: FAILED TO MAINTAIN RESIDENCY WITHIN NEW YORK STATE , AND WAS OBSERVED ON SEVERAL OCCASIONS AT NEW JERSEY LOCATIONS PRIOR TO THE START OF HIS TOUR OF DUTY.
FAILEED TO NOTIFY HIS COMMANDING OFFICER OF HIS FAILURE TO MAINTAIN A RESIDENCE IN NYC OR ITS CONTIGUOUS RESIDENCE COUNTIES
FAILED TO NOTE IN HIS ACTIVITY LOG THAT HE TOOK POSSESSION OF PROPERTY AND FAILED TO PREPARE A VOUCHER FOR THE PROPERTY.
FAILED TO TAKE POLICE ACTION AFTER LEARNING OF AN ALLEGATION OF HARASSMENT WITH A WEAPON.
FAILED TO MAKE PROPER AND NECESSARY ENTRIES IN HIS ACTIVITY LOG.

charges.description: AFTER BEING AWARE OF AN ALLEGATION OF CORRUPTION OR OTHER MISCONDUCT INVOLVING A MEMBER OF THE SERVICE, SAID POLICE OFFICER FAILED AND NEGLECTED TO NOTIFY THE INTERNAL AFFAIRS BUREAU AS REQUIRED.
FAILED TO CONDUCT A PROPER INVESTIGATION, TO WIT: SAID DETECTIVE FAILED TO VISIT THE SCENE OF AN ALLEGED CRIME HE WAS ASSIGNED TO INVESTIGATE AND FAILED TO RECOVER CRIME SCENE EVIDENCE.
charges.penalty: SUSPENDED W/O PAY (15 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (30 day(s) )

charges.description: FAILED TO PROPERLY SUBMIT A COMPLAINT REPORT FOR FILING IN A TIMELY MANNER.
charges.penalty: SUSPENDED W/O PAY (15 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (30 day(s) )

charges.description: SAID DETECTIVE  WRONGFULLY INSTRUCTED A PERSON KNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT TO FILE A MISSING PROPERTY FORM RATHER THAN CONDUCTING A FOLLOW-UP INVESTIGATION.
charges.penalty: SUSPENDED W/O PAY (15 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (30 day(s) )

charges.description: WHILE ON-DUTY, HAVING RESPONDED TO AN ASSIGNMENT INVOLVING AN ALLEGED ROBBERY WITH A FIREARM, WRONGFULLY FAILED TO MAKE APPROPRIATE OR REQUIRED ACTIVITY LOG ENTRIES.

WHILE ON-DUTY, HAVING RESPONDED TO AN ASSIGNMENT INVOLVING AN ALLEGED ROBBERY WITH A FIREARM, WRONGFULLY FAILED TO PROPERLY SUPERVISE HIS SUBORDINATES BY FAILING TO DIRECT THEM TO PREPARE A COMPLAINT REPORT
WHILE ON-DUTY, HAVING RESPONDED TO AN ASSIGNMENT INVOLVING AN ALLEGED ROBBERY WITH A FIREARM, WRONGFULLY FAILED TO NOTIFY  THE DETECTIVE SQUAD FOR FURTHER INVESTIGATION

charges.description: ABUSED HIS AUTHORITY AS A MEMBER OF THE NEW YORK CITY POLICE DEPARTMENT, IN THAT HE STOPPED A PERSON UNKNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT WITHOUT SUFFICIENT LEGAL AUTHORITY.
WRONGFULLY USED FORCE, IN THAT HE USED A CONDUCTED ELECTRICAL WEAPON AGAINST A PERSON UNKNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT WITHOUT  POLICE NECESSITY.
WRONGFULLY USED FORCE, IN THAT HE USED PHYSICAL FORCE, NAMELY PUSHED A PERSON UNKNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT WITHOUT POLICE NECCESSITY.
ENGAGED IN A PHYSICAL ALTERCATION WITH A PERSON KNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT.
charges.penalty: COUNSELING, DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), PRE-TRIAL SUSPENSION DAYS (33 day(s) )

charges.description: FAILED TO RESIDE WITHIN THE CITY OF NEW YORK OR COUNTIES OF WESTCHESTER, ROCKLAND, ORANGE, PUTNAM, NASSAU OR SUFFOLK AS REQUIRED.
FAILED TO SUBMIT CHANGE OF NAME, RESIDENCE OR SOCIAL CONDITION FORM TO DEPARTMENT.
HAVING CHANGED SAID MEMBER'S RESIDENCE, FAILED TO MAINTAIN CORRECT DEPARTMENT OF MOTOR VEHICLE RECORDS .
WHILE ON SICK REPORT WRONGFULLY LEFT CONFINES OF THE CITY OR RESIDENCE COUNTIES WITHOUT APPROVAL FROM CHIEF OF PERSONNEL.
WRONGFULLY REPORTED A NEW YORK ADDRESS TO THE DEPARTMENT WHEN IN FACT SAID MEMBER RESIDED IN NEW JERSEY.

charges.description: WHILE OFF DUTY FAILED TO SAFEGUARD HIS SERVICE FIREARM AND PLACED SAID WEAPON IN AN UNLOCKED SAFETY BOX.

charges.description: WHILE OFF-DUTY, FAILED TO REMAIN AT THE SCENE OF AN UNUSUAL POLICE OCCURRENCE AND/OR PROMPTLY NOTIFY THE OPERATIONS UNIT.
WHILE OFF-DUTY, WRONGFULLY PROVIDED INACCURATE OR INCOMPLETE INFORMATION TO A NASSAU COUNTY 911 DISPATCHER.
WHILE OFF-DUTY,  UPON BEING PROMPTED FOR HER NAME BY A NASSAU COUNTY 911 DISPATCHER, FAILED TO PROVIDE HER NAME.
WHILE OFF-DUTY, WRONGFULLY REMOVED A PARTICIPANT IN AN UNUSUAL POLICE OCCURRENCE FROM THE SCENE OF THE INCIDENT WITHOUT INFORMING OR SEEKING GUIDANCE FROM LOCAL LAW ENFORCEMENT OR THE DEPARTMENT.

charges.description: DID FAIL AND NEGLECT TO MAINTAIN SAID OFFICER'S ACTIVITY LOG IN THAT SAID OFFICER COULD NOT LOCATE HIS ACTIVITY LOGS AND PROVIDE THEM FOR INSPECTION UPON REQUEST.
charges.penalty: DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), PRE-TRIAL SUSPENSION DAYS (30 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (15 day(s) )

charges.description: SAID OFFICER SCHEDULED TO PERFORM A TOUR OF 1400 HOURS TO 2235 HOURS, WAS ABSENT FROM SAID ASSIGNMENT AT 1400 HOURS AND DID NOT REPORT UNTIL 1425 HOURS, A PERIOD OF TWENTY-FIVE (25) MINUTES ABSENT WITHOUT LEAVE.
charges.penalty: DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), PRE-TRIAL SUSPENSION DAYS (30 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (15 day(s) )

charges.description: DID KNOWINGLY ASSOCIATE WITH A PERSON REASONABLY BELIEVED TO BE ENGAGED IN, LIKELY TO ENGAGE IN, OR TO HAVE ENGAGED IN CRIMINAL ACTIVITIES.
charges.penalty: DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), PRE-TRIAL SUSPENSION DAYS (30 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (15 day(s) )

charges.description: DID WRONGFULLY AND WITHOUT JUST CAUSE HAVE AN INTEREST IN OR AN ASSOCIATION WITH PREMISES ENGAGED IN ILLEGAL GAMBLING OPERATIONS.
charges.penalty: DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), PRE-TRIAL SUSPENSION DAYS (30 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (15 day(s) )

charges.description: FAILED TO DISCLOSE POTENTIALLY RELEVANT INFORMATION, SPECIFICALLY THAT HE KNEW A PERSON KNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT RUNNING AN ILLEGAL GAMBLING OPERATION.
charges.penalty: DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), PRE-TRIAL SUSPENSION DAYS (30 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (15 day(s) )

charges.description: WHILE OFF-DUTY, FAILED TO IDENTIFY HIMSELF AS A POLICE OFFICER WHILE TAKING POLICE ACTION AND WRONGFULLY SLAPPED A CELLULAR TELEPHONE FROM THE HAND FROM A PERSON KNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT.
WHILE OFF-DUTY, HAVING BEEN INVOLVED IN AN UNUSUAL POLICE OCCURRENCE WRONGFULLY FAILED TO NOTIFY THE DEPARTMENT's OPERATIONS UNIT AS REQUIRED.

charges.description: WHILE OFF-DUTY, POLICE OFFICER DID WRONGFULLY MAKE COMMUNICATIONS TO A PERSON KNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT, IN A MANNER LIKELY TO CAUSE ANNOYANCE OR ALARM.
WHILE OFF-DUTY, DID WRONGFULLY ATTEMPT TO PREVENT A PERSON KNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT FROM FILING A COMPLAINT AGAINST HER WITH THE NYPD.
WHILE ON-DUTY, SAID OFFICER WAS GIVEN A DIRECTIVE BY A SERGEANT, TO TAKE DOWN INFORMATION FROM A CALLER MAKING A CIVILIAN COMPLAINT, AND SAID OFFICER FAILED TO COMPLY WITH SAID DIRECTIVE.
WHILE ON-DUTY, WAS DISCOURTEOUS TO A SERGEANT.

charges.description: WHILE OFF-DUTY, WRONGFULLY OPERATED A MOTOR VEHICLE WHILE UNDER THE INFLUENCE OF AN INTOXICANT.
charges.penalty: COUNSELING, DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), ORDERED BREATH TESTING, PRE-TRIAL SUSPENSION DAYS (31 day(s) ), SUSPENDED W/O PAY (15 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (15 day(s) )

charges.description: WHILE OFF-DUTY, WRONGFULLY OPERATED A MOTOR VEHICLE WHILE HIS ABILITY WAS IMPAIRED BY THE CONSUMPTION OF ALCOHOL.
charges.penalty: COUNSELING, DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), ORDERED BREATH TESTING, PRE-TRIAL SUSPENSION DAYS (31 day(s) ), SUSPENDED W/O PAY (15 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (15 day(s) )

charges.description: WHILE OFF-DUTY, WRONGFULLY REFUSED TO SUBMIT TO A BREATHALYZER TEST.
charges.penalty: COUNSELING, DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), ORDERED BREATH TESTING, PRE-TRIAL SUSPENSION DAYS (31 day(s) ), SUSPENDED W/O PAY (15 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (15 day(s) )

charges.description: WHILE OFF-DUTY, WRONGFULLY CONSUMED AN INTOXICANT TO THE EXTENT THAT HE WAS UNFIT FOR DUTY.
charges.penalty: COUNSELING, DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), ORDERED BREATH TESTING, PRE-TRIAL SUSPENSION DAYS (31 day(s) ), SUSPENDED W/O PAY (15 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (15 day(s) )

charges.description: WHILE ON DUTY FAILED TO PROCESS THE ARREST OF A PERPETRATOR WHO WAS PATRONIZING A PROSTITUTE.
WHILE ON DUTY IMPROPERLY ISSUED TWO (2) SUMMONSES FOR TRAFFIC AND LIMOUSINE COMMISSION VIOLATIONS TO A PERPETRATOR WHO WAS NOT ACTING IN THE CAPACITY OF A TRAFFIC AND LIMOUSINE COMMISSION DRIVER.
